top_comments.comment: When it gets colder, you'll realize how moronic this really is!

comments_since_last_sample.body: All unproven scare mongering by big money making consortiums to make the average person pay them money by way of a climate tax nothing more.

This BS makes me laugh. We have absolutely no idea what the global temperature trends are. We have approximately 0.000004% of the earths climatological history accurately mapped.

Considering that archeologist are uncovering well used trade routes that have previously been covered by glaciers for hundreds of years if not a millennium. I would say that the earth was warmer.

The people who follow the religion of global cooling. Sry, I mean warming. Or is it man made climate change. No, I remember now. It's the orwellian climate change. Those fanatics want you to believe that with absolutely no evidence, the world is going to end.
is there enough time to go carbon neutral in 5 years
Was warmer than that a while back. Looking forward to palm trees n no snowblowers. Just need to reintroduce Dinos. Go full Cretaceous. Better than that aoc dingbats plan

People dont care about climate change because it is the future's problem. Not them.  When a children or youngster says something about actions to curb gas emission, they laugh.
three degrees cooling means the next ice age and starvation.  without co2 plants cannot thrive and make food.
The side effects have been felt by most of mankind. The world is heading towards destruction due to pollution of water, air, soil, and disregard for efforts to stop this destruction.

Let's talk about ocean acidification.
The music in carbon binding and oxygene production plays in the oceans, not at land.

We could breath without trees, but not without phytoplancton, that produces over 75% of the global oxygene. And binds over 75% of the carbon dioxyde into organic mass. These organisms as well as coral reefs and diatoms, are endangered by carbon acid, CO2 in H2O.

How did the CO2 get into the oceans?
By the cooler water temperatures of the current ice-age, as cool water can absorb far mor gases as warm water.

When will the CO2 gas leave the oceans, again?
With the warmer water temperatures at the end off the ice-age.

When is the current ice-age over?
The current ice-age (that started around 30 millions years ago) is officially over, when both poles, arctic and antarctic, melt once a year away.
When it gets colder, you'll realize how moronic this really is!
We're all going to die unless we make al gore richer. Ha ha, I'm not giving climate change cultists a single cent, EVER.
